mapper.insert: insert into WGQC_Ad (ad_id , ad_picture , ad_location, ad_href , ad_status , create_time) values (#{adId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adHref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT wa.ad_picture adpicture from WGQC_Ad wa where wa.ad_status = 'Y'

SELECT wg.colorpic colorpic,ws.proname proname, wg.prodescri prodescri, ws.sku sku, ws.sellprice from WGQC_Sku ws, WGQC_Goods wg where ws.proskuid = wg.proid and ws.isdiscount = 'N' ORDER BY ws.salevolume DESC limit 12
